Im trying to write a text based user interface. I can get the output 
from the program and use test cases to prove if the output is as 
expected but...

I now need to simulate the users entry at the keyboard in a test 
case, this needs to be done, by the test class listening to the 
System.in channel, but i cant figure out how to get a test class to 
write to this chanel - to simulate the user input

Anybody any ideas

Steve
